property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you played a Reversal card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Elbow to the Face. When successfully played, your opponent randomly discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 3D or greater maneuver. When successfully played, your opponent may put 1 non-unique Reversal card from his Ring area into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 3D or greater maneuver and can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. As a reversal, this card is -5F, reverse any maneuver with the word 'atomic'in the title or any maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be packed by The Big Show. When your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, this card is -2F. Can only be played after a successfully played 2D or greater maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 3D or greater maneuver or, if this is a Tag Team format match, when this is the first card played of your turn and you have just been 'tagged'into the match. As an action, this card is -15F and -15D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 Volley maneuver from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 8D or greater maneuver. Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. When successfully played, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. Can only be reversed by Reversal cards of printed D:1 or greater. Your opponent cannot play the card Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'diva'or 'female'in the text, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, your opponent may look at your hand, choose 1 card, and you put the chosen card on top of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may remove 4 cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -3F when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. When successfully played, your opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card or if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. When this card is in your Ring area, your cards with the word 'leg'in the title are +1D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -6F and when this is the first card played of your turn, it is also +4D. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver of 3D or less and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -5F and can only be played after the card titled Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. As a reversal, reverse any card with the word 'atomic,''bomb'or 'driver'in the title and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 Set-up card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -6F. As a reversal, reverse any Chain or Heat maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, choose up to 2 Foreign Object maneuvers in your Ringside pile not titled Everything and the Kitchen Sink. Those maneuvers are considered played from your hand and are played in the order of your choice after this card. Resolve each card's effects and damage before the next card is considered played. After all of these cards have been played, if any have been reversed, your turn ends.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -5F when your Fortitude Rating is equal to or less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. As a maneuver, your opponent discards 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any card if it is not the first, second, or third card played this turn and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, overturn up to 5 cards. This card is -2F for each card overturned. When successfully played, shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card or if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. As a reversal, reverse any Run-in card and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, put 1 Pre-match Manager or 1 card with the words 'guest ringside announcer'in the title from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. As a maneuver, if you have the cards titled Irish Whip, Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, and Springboard in your Ring area, you win the game via Pinfall Victory. As an action, this card is -11F and -14D, discard this card and search your Arsenal for the card titled Irish Whip, Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, or Springboard, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 1 Maneuver card and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card with the words 'arm drag'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your non-Throwback maneuvers with the words 'arm drag'in the title are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any card that cannot be reversed or any Foreign Object and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then shuffle up to 2 other cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, look at the top 4 cards of your Arsenal, put 1 into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, all players randomly discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and if your next card played this turn is a non-unique card, it is -10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -3F. You cannot play the card titled Small Package for the rest of the turn. As a reversal, you may play this card without discarding any cards, reverse any Chain maneuver of 4D or less and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and you have 5 or more cards titled Small Package in your Ring area, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -4F. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver with the word 'suplex'in the title and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, this card is -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he puts the chosen card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, remove up to 2 cards in your hand from the game. This card is -2D for every card fewer than 2 removed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this is the first card played of your turn and you reversed a card from your hand to end your opponent's last turn, this card can only be reversed from his Backlash deck or Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, you may put all cards in your hand except this card on the bottom of your Arsenal. If you do, this card is -7F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card also counts as a High Risk maneuver when it is in your Ringside pile or Arsenal. As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card. When played after the card titled From the Middle Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope, can only be reversed from your opponent's hand by Unique Reversal cards or from his Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. Can only be played after a successfully played Strike or Grapple maneuver or a card with the word 'knee'in the title. Cannot be reversed by unique or hybrid Reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, discard up to 5 cards. This card is -2F for each card discarded. When successfully played, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Arsenal and put them back on the top or bottom of his Arsenal in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, your Submission maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn, if you successfully play a card, you may overturn 3 cards and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may look at your opponent's hand or Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 2 Maneuver cards and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for 1 Action card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. When this card is in your Ring area, your Grapple maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may discard 1 Mid-match card and then look at your opponent's Backlash deck, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver. Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver, can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, discard up to 5 cards and overturn the same number of cards. This card is -2F for each card discarded. When successfully played, shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card. As an action, this card is -11F and -14D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 F:0 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, remove the top card of your Arsenal from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is equal to or less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Reverse any High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn. He discards 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from your hand and when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end his turn. During your next turn, the first card you play is -#F, where # is equal to the Fortitude Value of the reversed maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are packing this card, you cannot pack the cards titled Escape Move, No Sell Maneuver, Over Sell Maneuver, Raw and Ready, Reach For the Ropes, Step Aside, or Strangle Hold. Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card. When this card reverses when overturned, remove this card from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 card from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 Volley maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. The next maneuver you play this turn is +2D for every card titled Build Momentum in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar. Put 1 card with the word 'diva'or 'female'in the text from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the word 'diva'or 'female'in the text, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating or when you have a Volley maneuver in your Ring area or Ringside pile. Put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card and your next card played this turn is -7F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When this card is in your Ring area, if you successfully play a maneuver, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your opponent discards 5 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then look at the top 10 cards of your Arsenal, put 2 into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card or discard 1 card. When you began your turn with this card in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 1 Heat card and then your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of your Heat cards that have been removed from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Draw 1 card. When your next card played this turn is a maneuver of 9D or less, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F for every card in your Ring area with the words 'old school'in the title. Shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the words 'old school'in the title, and then remove either 3 Chain cards, 2 Heat cards, or 1 Volley card in your opponent's Ring area from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 7 or more cards in your Ring area with the word 'that's'in the title. You win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Remove 2 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game. When this card is in your Ring area, non-unique maneuvers played from your opponent's hand also count as Action cards until the end of his turn.

card.name: Grab WWE Timekeeper Mark Yeaton's Chair

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Foreign Object from your Ringside pile into your hand. When your next card played this turn is a Foreign Object, choose 2: it is -20F, ignore the 'Can only be played...'text, or your opponent's Reversal cards to it are +10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent puts 3 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal. Look at his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent, draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as him. When you do not, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent may draw 1 card. Your next card played this turn can only be reversed from his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Name 1 non-Superstar-specific Maneuver card. When this card is in your Ring area, no player can play the named card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 12 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are a Female Superstar or Val Venis, the maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal for every card titled Hello, Ladies! in your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may put 1 card from your hand on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. When this is a Raw Draft or Rumble Draft format match, you may instead shuffle in 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, your opponent looks at your hand and chooses 1 card. Shuffle the chosen card and any other number of cards into your Arsenal and then draw the same number of cards shuffled in. Then look at his hand, choose 1 card, he shuffles the chosen card into his Arsenal, and draws 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards cards from his Backlash deck equal to the number of cards titled Who's Cooler than Michelle McCool? in your Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'blindside'in the title, put it into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may discard 1 card with the word 'blindside'in the title, put this card into your Ringside pile, and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'precision'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card counts as either a Pre-match Event or a Mid-match Action in your Backlash deck for the purposes of deck construction. Your opponent skips his first turn of the game if he has 2 or more non-Enforcer non-Superstar cards revealed in his Backstage area. As an action, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may discard 1 Volley maneuver and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he puts the chosen card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put 1 Face card and 1 Unique card from your Ringside pile and 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Superstar Value is less than your opponent's Superstar Value. At the end of the Pre-match phase, when your opponent has a Title Belt or a card with the word 'McMahon'in the title in his Ring area, look at his hand and choose cards equal to the number of Title Belts and cards with the word 'McMahon'in the title in his Ring area and he discards the chosen cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your Reversal cards have the Restricted Modification Symbol and you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any Activated Card Effect from a non-unique card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a card goes into any player's Ring area, that player overturns 1 card. If the overturned card is a Reversal card, he overturns 1 additional card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 Venue card or 1 non-Superstar-specific non-Active Event card in your opponent's Ring area. This card gains that text and that card loses that text. You cannot play Pre-match cards.

card.name: Not In Front of the Kids!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when there is a Venue card in any Ring area. Cannot be reversed when your opponent has a Venue card in his Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, all maneuvers are -4D. When any player successfully plays a maneuver, he may discard any number of cards and that maneuver is +2D for each card discarded. Once during each of your turns, before your Draw Segment, you may remove 2 cards in your Ringside pile from the game. If you do not, put this card into your Ringside pile.

card.name: The GM of Stevie Night Heat

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your Heat maneuvers are -2F and if you successfully play a Heat maneuver, choose 1: your opponent discards 1 card or he overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 1 card and then put this card into your Backlash deck.

card.name: You Knew It Would End This Way...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent overturns 8 cards. You cannot play the card titled You Knew It Would End This Way... for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have a Title Belt card in your Ring area. Your opponent discards 1 card for every card titled Here I Stand: The Champion in your Ring area. You cannot play the card titled Here I Stand: The Champion for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When this card is in your Ring area, if you have the cards Candice: Internet Icon, Christy: Curvy Cutie, Lilian: Amazing Announcer, Maria: Ideal Interviewer, Melina: Naughty Manager, and Sharmell: Sizzling Spouse in your Ring area, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when the card titled Grab the Ref is in your Ring area. Randomly remove up to 8 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game and put 1 Volley card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. Reveal your hand to your opponent and if you have the cards titled Candice: Internet Icon, Christy: Curvy Cutie, Lilian: Amazing Announcer, Maria: Ideal Interviewer, Melina: Naughty Manager, and Sharmell: Sizzling Spouse in your hand, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal any number of Chain cards in your hand. Shuffle up to double that many cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

card.name: In This Ring, I Just Might Be...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 Chain card when you have another Chain card in your Ring area, 1 Heat card when you have another Heat card in your Ring area, and 1 Volley card when you have another Volley card in your Ring area. Reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Introduce Your Brain to Your Mouth...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn. Put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: One More Time - One Last Chance

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +10F for every card titled One More Time - One Last Chance in your Ring area. Remove all cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then discard all cards in your hand. Put 1 card from your Ring area into your hand or put 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game into your hand. When that card is your next card played this turn, you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the words 'spine buster' or 'spinebuster' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your cards with the words 'spine buster' or 'spinebuster' in the title are -10F. Your opponent's Reversal cards deal no Damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Superstar Value is +1. When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is 10F or greater, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Maneuver cards in your Ring area +3 and your next maneuver played this turn can only be reversed from his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card or if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. As an action, this card is -40F and -40D, put this card and up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You may shuffle 1 Grapple maneuver from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Strike or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may put 1 D:0 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. If you do, put 1 non-unique card from your Ring area into your Ringside pile. You may pack any cards with the Christian logo, but you do not count as that Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may remove 1 card in your hand and the top card of your Arsenal from the game and then put 1 non-unique Pre-match Event or 1 non-unique Pre-match Object from your Ringside pile into your Ring area and end your turn. When your opponent moves this card from your Ring area, put up to 3 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -4F and -7D, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and your opponent discards 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any Activated Card Effect and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 card and then put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand. When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, your opponent may discard 4 cards. If he does not, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver with the word 'punch,''slam,'or 'suplex'in the title and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack maneuvers of 3D or greater. Once during each of your turns, if you successfully play an Action card, you may put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played when your opponent has a Venue card in his Ring area. The text on his Venue is blank. When your opponent does not have a Venue card in his Ring area, your Starting Hand Size is +1 and your Superstar Value is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'diva'in the text, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'diva'in the text, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may overturn 4 cards and then put this card into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot play maneuvers during his next 3 turns.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -5F and -7D, discard this card and draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area or Ringside pile, once during each of your turns you may discard 2 cards and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard any number of cards and then search your Arsenal for the same number of non-hybrid Reversal cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent plays a Reversal card, you may draw 1 card. When you play a Reversal card, discard 1 card. You may pack the card titled No Sell Maneuver and any cards with the 'Hollywood' Hulk Hogan logo, but you do not count as that Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage area when you reveal your Superstar card. During your opponent's turn, you may hide this card to blank the text on an Action card or Maneuver card played by him for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After all cards have been played in the Pre-match, choose a number from 0 to 10. Your Starting Hand Size is -# and your Superstar Value is +#, where # is equal to the chosen number. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may remove this card from the game and then search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific Maneuver card or 1 Superstar-specific Action card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand and Arsenal.

card.name: Fight for the Rights of Every Man

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -5F when the card titled I am a Real American is in your Ringside pile. Search your Arsenal for 2 Unique cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: In My Day, a Maneuver Was a Maneuver

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend Superstar. As an action, choose up to 3 non-hybrid non-multi Maneuver cards in your Ringside pile, randomly shuffle 1 into your Arsenal, and put the rest into your hand. As a reversal, completely reverse any hybrid maneuver or Multi maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's cards with the Restricted Modification Symbol do not have it. During his turn, his Action cards and Maneuver cards with the word 'reverse' in the text have blank text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, choose 1: your opponent randomly discards 1 card or he randomly discards 1 card from his Backlash deck. You start the match regardless of your opponent's Superstar Value or Superstar Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 Venue, Stipulation, or Event card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, the chosen card has blank text and when you reverse a card from anywhere except your Arsenal, remove the reversed card from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text until the end of the turn and end your opponent's turn. Overturn cards equal to that maneuver's damage and then shuffle cards into your Arsenal equal to double your Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn cards until you overturn a Maneuver card. Put that card into your hand instead of into your Ringside pile. When it is your next card played this turn, it is F:0 and you may ignore the 'can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Randy Orton or a Legend Superstar. Reverse any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can only pack 50 cards in your Arsenal. You may pack Enforcers in your Backstage area. Reveal any number of SmackDown! Enforcer cards and choose 1 Enforcer. Your non-GM opponents cannot play Stipulation cards. Once during each of your turns you may put 2 cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 Reversal card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal, look at your opponent's hand, choose that many cards, and he puts them on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When successfully played, your opponent puts 5 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

card.name: Your Freaking Hero or John Cena?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card. ≥ Starting Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +5 Superstar Ability: + When you successfully play a Chain card, you may draw 1 card. ≥ Starting Hand Size: +9 Superstar Value: +4 Superstar Ability: + When you successfully play a maneuver from your hand, you may discard 1 card and then your opponent randomly discards 3 cards from his Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your next maneuver played this turn is +5D. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 5 cards or shuffle up to 5 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 2 cards and then search your Arsenal for 1 Foreign Object or 1 maneuver with the word 'punch' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When you successfully play a Foreign Object maneuver or a maneuver with the word 'punch' in the title, you may look at his hand, choose 1 card, and he puts the chosen card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Foreign Object maneuvers and maneuvers with the word 'punch'in the title are -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played, draw up to 4 cards.

card.name: Who Wants to be My Friend?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Your opponent puts all cards in his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal. As a reversal, this card is -8F, reverse any Submission or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -15F when played after the card titled Irish Whip. As a reversal, reverse any Submission or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Heat cards are not removed from the game when you move a card from your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card, discard 1 card, and your opponent overturns 1 card. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 4 cards and then put this card into your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose up to 10 cards in your Ringside pile. Your opponent may overturn that many cards. If he does not, shuffle the chosen cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal your hand to your opponent. Your next 2 cards played this turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 1 card and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may pack is increased by 10. You cannot pack Mid-match cards. Once during each of your turns you may remove 1 Pre-match card in your Backlash deck from the game and then put 1 non-unique non-hybrid Maneuver card or 1 card titled Melina: Naughty Manager from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card or if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, once during each of your turns you may put this card into your hand and then remove all cards in your Ringside pile from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your next card played from your hand this turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any non-unique maneuver and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played, discard any number of cards and then shuffle double that many cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a maneuver, you may discard 1 Unique card and then search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific card or the card titled Diversion, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Once during each turn, when you successfully play a Superstar-specific card or the card titled Diversion, you may put up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. You can pack any cards with the Hurricane logo or Stacy Keibler logo, but you do not count as those Superstars.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 3 cards, put them under this card, and shuffle your Arsenal. If a card under this card is a Superstar-specific card, you may play it as if it were in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage area when you reveal your Superstar card. Your opponent's cards with 'look at your opponent's hand'or 'look at his hand'in the text have blank text. During your turn you may hide this card, shuffle all cards in your hand into your Arsenal, and then draw the same number of cards you had.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played Superstar-specific maneuver or if you reversed a card from your hand to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique non-hybrid Maneuver card and the card titled Greetings, Citizen, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and you cannot play the card titled Greetings, Citizen for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, this card is -13F. Put up to 5 cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal, shuffle up to double that many cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then draw the same number of cards you shuffled into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Remove 1 non-Backlash-deck card (even if it's Permanent) in your opponent's Ring area from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 Action card, 1 Maneuver card, and 1 Reversal card, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and end your turn.

card.name: Finally... The Rock Has Come Back To...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When there is a Venue or Pay-Per-View Event in any Ring area, search your Arsenal for 1 Unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When there is not a Venue or Pay-Per-View Event in any Ring area, discard this card and then shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack up to 6 copies of this card. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may remove 6 cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage area when you reveal your Superstar card. You may pack and reveal up to 3 copies of this card. Once during each turn, if you successfully play a Unique card, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, put up to 2 cards from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -16F and -14D, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and draw 1 card. When successfully played by Chris Benoit, you may then put up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card if it is not the first card played on your opponent's turn or any Heat card and end his turn. Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then draw that many cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put this card into your Ring area from your Backlash deck when you play a Stipulation card. Once during each of your turns you may allow your opponent to shuffle 1 card from his Ringside pile into his Arsenal and draw 1 card; if you do, you may search your Arsenal for 1 Face card, 1 Heel card, or 1 Chain card, reveal it to him, put into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this is card is -30F. As a reversal, reverse any card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -15F and can only be played after a successfully played card. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. Shuffle up to 3 cards with the word 'kick'in the title from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-hybrid Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack up to 5 copies of this card. When successfully played, your opponent randomly reveals 5 cards in his hand. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may overturn 5 cards and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'punch'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1 for every 2 cards with the word 'punch'in the title in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack up to 4 copies of this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are packing this card you cannot pack the card titled Step Aside. Reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn. During your next turn the first card you play cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your maneuvers with the word 'chop'in the title are +1D. When you successfully play a maneuver with the word 'chop'in the title, you may draw 1 card or put 1 Superstar-specific card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after your opponent plays a card that he has modified by other cards. Disregard all modifications made to that card by other cards until the end of the turn. You may still play Reversal cards to that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-Trademark Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 3D or greater maneuver or the card titled Irish Whip. Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -5F, you may put 1 non-unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand. As a reversal, reverse any non-unique Mid-match card and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, you may choose 1 different Enforcer.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when your opponent is Vince McMahon, Triple H, or The Game. Your opponent overturns cards equal to his Superstar Value plus the number of cards in his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack up to 5 copies of this card. Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played, shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 1. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You may put this card into your Ring area from your Backlash deck whenever you play a Manager card or a card with the word 'Manager'in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal your hand to your opponent and end your turn. The first card he plays on his next turn is -6F and reversals to that card are +15F. After he plays a card during his next turn or if he ends his turn without playing a card, he puts all cards in his hand on top of his Arsenal and then shuffles that many cards from his Ringside pile into his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card. As an action, this card is -5D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then either draw 2 cards or put the card titled Managed by Stevie Richards from your Ringside pile into your Ring area and discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. Can only be reversed by the card titled Elbow to the Face. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.

card.name: When You Run the Show, You Make the Rules

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a GM or Chairman Superstar. During this turn and your next turn, your cards cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck. He skips his next turn.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Batista, Christy, Snitsky, Heidenreich, The Leader of the Peepulation, MNM, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Theodore Long, The HurriFriends, The Immortal One

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card if it is your opponent's first card played of the turn or reverse any Activated Card Effect if he hasn't successfully played a card this turn. Put 1 card titled No Chance in Hell! from your Ringside pile into your hand. He overturns 10 cards. When 1 of those cards is a non-hybrid Action card he continues his turn. Otherwise, end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may draw 1 card or put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. When your opponent is a Male Superstar, once during each of his turns he may draw 1 card. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, once during each of your turns he overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1 when the card titled ECW Championship Belt is in your Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, if you successfully play a maneuver, your opponent randomly puts 1 card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal. When he successfully plays a maneuver, you put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a card from his hand or Backlash deck, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put the reversed card into your hand instead of your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may allow your opponent to draw 3 cards and then put this card into your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may remove 1 card in your Ringside pile from the game, shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, draw 2 cards and your next card played this turn is -4F. As a reversal, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand and put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, if you play the card titled Shelton's Spinning Heel Kick as a maneuver, it is -5F and +3D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. As an action, this card is -30F and -20D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
